messages.message: I'm really worried about tomorrow's meeting.
Everything feels overwhelming right now.
I can’t stop overthinking everything.
What if something goes wrong?
I keep replaying the worst-case scenarios in my head.
I’m so stressed out about everything.
I can’t seem to calm my nerves.
What if I’m making a huge mistake?
I feel like I’m constantly on edge.
I can’t stop thinking about what might happen.
Everything feels like too much to handle.
I’m so anxious about how things will turn out.
I wish I could just relax, but I can’t.
I feel like I’m about to mess everything up.
I can’t shake this feeling of dread.
I’m scared I won’t be able to cope with it all.
What if I fail?
Every little thing makes me so nervous.
I can’t stop worrying, even when there’s nothing I can do.
I feel like I’m spiraling out of control.
